name: Tenshi-tachi no Gogo II: Bangaihen
overview: Tenshitachi no Gogo 2: Bangai-hen is a side-story of Tenshitachi no Gogo 2: Minako. The game's protagonist is the brother of Kozue Yanagisawa, one of the female characters that appeared in Minako. Their parents want to send him abroad to study, but he can't bear to be separated from his sister. Do his feelings to his sister cross the line, becoming forbidden love?.. The gameplay in this installment follows the traditional Japanese adventure template typical for the series: at each screen, the player is presented with a large menu of verbs and objects. Usually, it is required to go through most of the options to be able to move to another location or trigger an event. There are many wrong choices and dead ends, which lead to Game Over.
